name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 037
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, Restoring The Sacred Timeline, because if we do not maintain it we will end up with a multiverse of madness. Inspired by Loki season one with a color palette taken straight from the god of mischief himself.
